com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.devicecompiler
Class DeviceCompilerService

java.lang.Object
  com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.Service
      com.cambiumnetworks.wa.services.devicecompiler.DeviceCompilerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class DeviceCompilerService
extends Service

This is a tool called as a service for Wireless Adviser that allows the user to generate PHP source, polling definitions and trap definitions for new device types by reading XML or WAD files.

Author:

Also simplified the logging config file - for now, just log everything to stdout.txt and stderr.txt. Can consider getting more elaborate later. Now the div tags don't get overwritten by the "no data found" message.
